website_summaries.verdict: This compact air fryer is the perfect choice for a small household looking for a healthier alternative to traditional fried foods.
pros: Compact machine that fits easily on a countertop or in a drawer
cons: Despite its dishwasher-safe parts, users report that cleaning up is messy and time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Received used item instead a new one
customer_reviews.text: I buy the new product and received a used Is it a good practice? Is it a standard practice? Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Mateus

customer_reviews.title: Love it and use it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product a lot! I use it to reheat frozen snacks as well. I broke the handle within 3 days of using the product because it fell on the floor. I contacted Philips and they sent me a replacement. The handle they sent isn't black but I didn't care because as long as it works well, I'm happy. I don't use my toaster over to reheat any frozen snacks any more since my fryer does a much better job and faster. So far, I have fry a cornish hen, a whole fish, and tofu. All turned out well!
customer_reviews.author: Loann N.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a used one or open box item
customer_reviews.text: Not coming with the original Philips box. No user manual, no cook book. It looks like a used one or open box item. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Hui Chen

customer_reviews.title: loved it before it died ___philips sent me a replacement
customer_reviews.text: It is a really usefull product but it fell apart after a month using it ave 3 to 4 times a week. Also the inner part is really hard to reach and clean. Edited: Philips customer service is great. They sent me a new one even though I got the previous one second handed from Amazon so I guess now it deserves more stars? Again I really like the product but maybe buying a brand new one would be a better idea??
customer_reviews.author: azin

customer_reviews.title: Best cooker I've owned so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooker. I have made so many different meals in it and they all have been wonderful. Brats cooked in an air fryer are now my favorite way to cook them, pork chops are crispy on the outside and really tender and juicy in the center. The pan is super easy to clean, just pop it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T. Conte

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: While I agree it's really easy to clean up, it's very poorly made. Using a heavier gauge of metal for the cooking parts would make a big difference. Sorta like a cheap kids toy - And I cut my hand twice (minor) washing the metal bucket (basket.)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: ... things in 30 minutes or less and is very good for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: It does most things in 30 minutes or less and is very good for 2 people. The recipes in the accompanying book are delicious. I recommend buying the grill pan accessory to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 30 days...
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is junk. The mechanical timer sticks and the heater only blows warm air...not hot enough to cook. I purchased this July 15, 2019 and it worked for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: mike w.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on frozen foods
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I wanted one of these or not. Now I can't live without it!!! Does a great job on frozen foods!! Still learning what I can cook in it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Well I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Air Fryer and it's great. Although I overcooked this huge Chicken Breast is still tasted great. One beef though in the Owner's Manual it kept referring to the Figures/Picture and there were none. Would buy again. I have been using this for 2 weeks now and I love it, no fuss no muss, this is the ticket!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Rola

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!! I want to buy another one ( ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I lived with out this thing! It’s amazing!! I want to buy another one ( bigger)!! You won’t be disappointed with this model. It’s very easy to use and clean. We make steaks, chicken, salmon and frozen apps mostly in the air fryer. There is so much you can do with it. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Listen Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cooks wonderful chicken without loss of moisture or flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product now for two years and I love it. I use it to cook chicken, hamburgers, French fries, chicken nuggets, meatballs, onion rings, bacon wrapped shrimp... I love it. I even dropped it on the concrete sidewalk when I first purchased it and it's never had a problem. I read one review that said that it rested and I've never seen any rust. It is so easy to clean. I bought one twice the size for my daughter and she uses hers for her family of 5 on a regular basis. Such a wonderful product. Thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance for the small family or late night snacks
customer_reviews.text: Everything great so far... hint French fries coat with about a teaspoon of cooking oil...
customer_reviews.author: T. Talmage

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased one of these when they first became available! Haven't explored all the possibilities, but I think most any food that needs to be cooked quickly and/or would be better with a crunch could be done in this cooker, which seems to be the all-time, top-rated appliance of this type. So simple to use. (One doesn't need the digital model.)
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy Ever. We love our air fryer. Super fast and easy to use. I like knowing I'm not filling my family with grease but we can still enjoy a nice crunchy flavor. It is fairy loud when running but not so much to prevent us from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and it cooked food real well BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and it cooked food real well BUT it was not easy to clean up (as stated in description). I tried lining the bottom with aluminum foil but this disrupted the air flow and food was not cooked as well. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is awesome. I've already made homemade French fries, sweet potato fries, frozen chicken strips, and fresh chicken. The chicken was juicy and crispy. Both fries were great and very little oil is used. So much healthier. Great recipe book came with it. Will use this air fryer often. Fun to experiment with.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I didn't think I would use it so much, but it's very easy to use. Root vegetables and brussel sprouts come out really well. Just a light rub of olive oil and cook at 350 for 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cummins

customer_reviews.title: cooks good
customer_reviews.text: the basket doesn't clean well and the inner pan is peeling after a year of use I us it once or twice a week and clean it after every use but the food sticks to it. they say the peeling finish is not harmful but I have my doubts, I think I will look for a different system
customer_reviews.author: Art G

customer_reviews.title: Great for small portion
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and great alternative to using big oven when you're only cooking for 1-2 persons. Turn knob timer (no digital display) means this is a fairly basic unit. It cooks fast and does really change the way I cook. It seems a bit underpowered but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great airfryer, big enough for 2 people, steaks come out great and clean up is a breeze! Definitely non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: lynxlady

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy
customer_reviews.text: The best buy that I made all year. And yes you can turn the timer off by hand, at least the one that I have I can.
customer_reviews.author: MD2K

customer_reviews.title: Chicken gets cooked
customer_reviews.text: Raw chicken goes in. Cooked chicken comes out. 5/5 would cook chicken again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Blake Hughes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: been using It like crazy just to crisp things up ( that's what I wanted It for ) May be used 40 times . food really does NOT need hardly any tossing ( like fries ) I just let them go . BUT anything you put in you should monitor. i.e. you can just pull out drawer while running and poke around to see how it's going.
customer_reviews.author: josephblasinski

customer_reviews.title: the philips did a way better job. The fan inside are stronger
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the $40 airfryer I got from Walmart, the philips did a way better job. The fan inside are stronger, the bottom design allow the hot hair circulate back up for more even cooking, meaning you don’t have to flip the chicken and still he the crisp on both side.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought it earlier!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it everyday after I got it! It is basically a mini oven, works so efficient! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Whites

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I expected. A bit small but I make it work. Great to use for my kids since it makes healthier food. It crisps up for nicely and quickly. Easy cleanup. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He says he uses it everyday. He heats up pizza and chicken wings. He says the frozen fries taste awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a present for my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my husband. He loves it! His friends have asked him about it because they all want one now!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this fryer.
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this fryer. All those deep fried dishes I've wanted to try but didn't because of the oil and mess are now daily options. We're still experimenting with new things to try all the time.
customer_reviews.author: DNH

customer_reviews.title: My Air Fryer paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: It is well worth the money. Makes the crispiest chicken wings without having to use breading. Makes meat so succulent and juicy on the inside. I have even used it to heat my muffin so it's crunchy on the outside and soft, fluffy and buttery on the inside. Also for my lazy people, it is sooo easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Vice

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Use instead of oven saves a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Use instead of oven saves a lot of money and dies a great job. Easy operation and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for “healthy” fries 😁
customer_reviews.text: Great for fries (almost tastes like they were fried in oil) 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loving it. Everything I put in there comes out great.
customer_reviews.text: I have never gone wrong with a Philips product... from their electric toothbrushes to their electric shavers and even their Avent baby line. So I spent the extra money for their Airfryer. I believe they were the original inventor of the Airfryer. I am totally loving the product. Everything I put in there comes out great. I have now gotten to the point where I’m testing and experimenting with what I can put. It has already passed the test for left-over pizza (better than the oven) and even popcorn. Anyway, this is a great product and essential kitchen appliance. And go with Philips, it’s worth the premium charge.
customer_reviews.author: Pramuk M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I tried out my daughters before purchasing one myself. It makes cooking when I get home from work a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged/ cooks well
customer_reviews.text: worked great on 1st trial of panko chick thighs...only caveat was delivered in non- original packaging and had a silver dollar sized hole busted out of it in "luckily" the back of unit...as i am in footcast with limited mobility i decided to "foot" returning it....lil' more of that bubble wrap please!
customer_reviews.author: Androoid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Price seemed to go up for Chritmas, but nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday and it is still running well without issue I use it to prepare almost every meal
customer_reviews.author: LeCakeDeYellow

customer_reviews.title: Love the Philips Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Love the Philips Airfryer. Salmon, veggie, fries all perfect for the fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: Fun new way of cooking vegetables, and delicious fried chicken without the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kammasuri

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I've made tons of things from steaks to "fried" veggies and everything has tasted amazing. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for any frozen food - especially French fries and ...
customer_reviews.text: My oven went out. Used this instead until my oven got fixed. Great for any frozen food - especially French fries and tater tots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about an air fryer. Really. But totally happy with the appliance. Use it almost daily. Simple to use, easy to clean, food quality fine. Glad I overcame my skepticism.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Tex Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer for recipes for two people. Not real big, but perfect for small families. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: NIC

customer_reviews.title: Good for leftovers
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Too Small basket for making fries and chips.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Salter

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good. You must have this one, if you want to save time and money for your wonderful meal. But almost impossible to clean inside.
customer_reviews.author: John CExpert

customer_reviews.title: After a year still The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this air fryer for almost a year, works flawlessly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: How many dishes we can make in this?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product by Philips. Very easy to make many (almost OO) tasty dishes and it consumes less oil.
customer_reviews.author: Prudvi Raj Banala

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the used one, it comes like new I love it , it maybe too small so sometime I cook twice, but this is what I bought ! I minus one star for the delay in delivering !!!!!! I was really upset because I did need it in the day that it should be arrived
customer_reviews.author: alhanouf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. We love it and would recommend it to everyone who loves fried food. But doesn’t want the grease.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Time saver, easy clean, and really loved it. Use it every week.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the kitchen. I only wish I had bought a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R Potteiger

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooker, can made delicious food. easy clear and using
customer_reviews.author: John Cen

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: handy, need a little bit of work but still kinda easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the healthy food using less oil and that's what it is all about...good choice for health watchers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vimal Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It worth it, love to cook at home, so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: DPI PRESS SIGNS

customer_reviews.title: Food taste great
customer_reviews.text: We love cooking now with this air fryer. The food tast great an most things don’t need any oil at all !!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Price

customer_reviews.title: Eassy and less time to cook.
customer_reviews.text: It's an extraordinary machine that could be use for kids for the easy way to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best kitchen tool we've had so far! we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rasbburrise Stone

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to save time
customer_reviews.text: I used my air fryer almost daily. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to save time.
customer_reviews.author: Noell Sansom

customer_reviews.title: phillips
customer_reviews.text: works fine just smaller than I expected. it showed phillips 5 I assumed it was a five qt
customer_reviews.author: Richard Singletary

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This is no more than a convection oven. Too small and doesn’t really “fry” anything. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy one without a digital timer
customer_reviews.text: Like the performance and how it works but had to return it due to cheap erratic timer. Would only recommend a digital timer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Healthy way for an enjoyable food
customer_reviews.text: A very good, easy to use product for a healthy cooking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks food in a fraction of oil but still very delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Indeed an amazing buy. I have been using the air fryer for the last month and cannot believe I did not buy it before. Cooking in Phillips Turbostar air fryer is a breeze. And no, I'm not talking about cooking frozen fries here (which my whole office admits it does that pretty well), but actually dishes that are deep fried without using as much oil. So far I have cooked shrimps, chicken thighs, fish and chips, stuffed vegetables etc. All have turned out amazing and a breeze to cook. My only issue is that there are no properly listed accessories for this model (the one Amazon suggests does not fit this model). Buy one today and keep on experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Ak Bajpai

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, up until it stopped working in August 2018. I purchased it March 2018. It worked for a whole 5 months, and now I’m passed the return time?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise ! I love it !!!!! most things are done in less than 15 min Frozen foods are cooked with ease ! Would I buy it again YES and YES
customer_reviews.author: maurice buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Worst thing about it is that there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Make my own fries? Probably will never ever do that. Want to reheat some leftover fast food fries? It works great! Worst thing about it is that there is no “off” button. If you’re done but there is still time on the timer your best option is to unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Janzen

customer_reviews.title: the airfryer that we have in the USA is great.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the one that was sent to my german address yet because I am stuck in the USA presently. However, the airfryer that we have in the USA is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Howell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for what I was looking for. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney J. Kniess

customer_reviews.title: On the first day, the handle was broken.
customer_reviews.text: On the very first day, the handle was broken. The cooking using this product is really good, but the build quality......well. For those who want this product, don't use 'low quality plastic' handle ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just too small of a basket for me. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just too small of a basket for me. I returned & bought a bigger basket capacity. Maybe for 1 person, or 2 light eaters? not worth it to me to spend that much & then have to make multiple batches
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Want to return
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and gave recently. Person who I gave it to opened box and found it broken inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for sensitive ear.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and functional but too noisy. Be aware of loud turbo sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wish i listened to the other poor reviews. Disappointed in the performance and quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish i listened to the other poor reviews. Disappointed in the performance and quality of the product. Not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Buffone

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make healthier French Fries... ... Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: For the prep time & small amount it can do........not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Best for fried chicken
customer_reviews.text: My first air flyer is Black & Decker from Costco. It works very well. Unfortunately, the parts start to fall apart after one year. The Philips AirFlyer costs more even after on sale in Amazon. Compared to my previous one, with the same temperature setting, this one has more power. The design is more solid. It is easy to clean. Even though it said no pre-heat is required, I still recommend pre-heat. It makes difference. We use it to cook fried chicken, grilled fish, and a hamburger. No need to put any oil. Instead, it will extract the grease from the meat, and make the healthy meal. We do not have much luck on steaks and french fries.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Produces tasty fried food
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to make Korean spicy fried wings from a recipe I retrieved from the interwebs and french fries. Just from experimenting with these two items, quite successfully I might add, I believe that one could create, pretty much, anything that has been previously deep fried. The big difference is that you will add a somewhat drier, more of a "coated" batter to anything you put in the fryer. I think that the majority of the items one would air fry, versus deep fry, will be somewhat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanaude

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great performance.
customer_reviews.text: Our first airfryer was a different brand and it had to go in the garbage due to rust. This airfryer is 100% better than that brand. I have nothing bad to say about this product at all. No rust, able to withstand a brillo pad to clean it. Vey sturdy handle and basket, smooth insertion and removal of bucket. Great browning of food. Definitely would buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Kesha

customer_reviews.title: Worked As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and the item didn’t disappoint. It is easy to clean and don’t have to worry about where to store the grease afterwards (as I did when I had a deep fryer), also no oils in the air. Easy to clean as well. I’m satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: Why didnt I get one of these before?!!?!!?
customer_reviews.text: Hands down ... the BEST french fries, tater tots, chicken nuggets, chicken tenders, fried chicken ... and EVEN APPLE-N-BANANA CRISPS come out if this thing!!!! I have made all the above from frozen and/or freshly handmade and all were absolutely divine!!! I had no idea there was such a cult following of these Airfryers, but after 2 uses, I can completely understand why!!! It's an amazing small appliance and works better (and faster) than my brand new convection oven with all its bells and whistles!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A big no
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with oil free cooking. Food is tasteless. French fries have to be eaten quickly before they become limp if made from fresh potatoes. Have to stir foods frequently to get an even cook. Anything you batter yourself is disgusting. I would save my money and just use an oven.
customer_reviews.author: GLAMMA

customer_reviews.title: Philips TurboStar Airfryer.
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer! Price was good, and this thing seems very durable and should last for quite a while. We have done french fries, cauliflower, kale chips, broccoli, and much more. These things are really something. They work fast, don't heat up the kitchen and don't seem to use a boatload of power. So get one for yourself and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick M

customer_reviews.title: No Heating up kitchen in 100+ weather
customer_reviews.text: With the summer heat we have found the air fryer to not only allow us to cook healthier meals with no oil, but we aren't heating up or spending much time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. King

customer_reviews.title: Better than using a microwave, nearly as fast.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every day since it arrived, and am still learning how versatile this product is. While it's easier to stick with heat & serve pre cooked foods, I'm discovering how well it works with steaks, pork chops, etc. It was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: HD-RIDER

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I does more things well than not. I got mine from amazon warehouse and have used it mostly for vegetables. My roasted chicken pieces were delicious as have been the vegetables. One of my favorite vegetables to roast are radishes. I do lots of French fries from real potatoes as well. I will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gateley

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I owned a different fryer before this one I preferred this pros the basket as it is very easy to clean cons it does not turn off while you open it unless the timer has finished.
customer_reviews.author: Beca

customer_reviews.title: Do some online research to understand the air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Need to read how to use & watch videos. The clean up is fast & easy, the food has been delicious from the first but it is different from deep frying in oil. Watch online videos to understand how to use, it is the fastest & easiest way to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte G Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Not frustration free
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this. Arrived broken, box was even tore open..Big chunk broken out of it. :(. Have another one and only had it for 4 months and the plastic on bottom broke, this one was bought to replace my first one..Do love the way they fry but have not had good luck with the fryer itself..
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have a good deal on Blackfriday. Use it 3 times. Everything is perfect. It doesn't smell like regular fryer and need just a little bit of oil. I think it good for my heart.
customer_reviews.author: BigHSML

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicken
customer_reviews.text: Makes real good chicken without oil. The skin is real crispy, while meat is moist. I haven't been able to master french fries, even when following the recipe in provided cookbook. They come out a little rubbery.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: 5th Wheel must have
customer_reviews.text: I must get down on knees to light oven in 5th wheel which normally isn't hard but after double knee replacements it is impossible. I thought this would work for items that need baking. It works great, only draw back is the amount that can be cooked at one time
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It works well for a few things I make. ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for a few things I make. I am not as excited about it as my friends are but that may be because I do not cook non veg.
customer_reviews.author: Anj

customer_reviews.title: Working momma loves this for quick food prep!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for over a year since gallbladder removal can’t eat deep fried stuff. I use it literally every day. It’s also great for quick kid food prep of nuggets & fries, or reheating, anything you’d use an oven for. Absolutely in love with this gadget and can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Drdidi

customer_reviews.title: "Why didn't I buy this sooner? " This sentence ...
customer_reviews.text: "Why didn't I buy this sooner?" This sentence alone should be enough for this review. It made fries so crunch, I thought those were McDonald fries.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: This brand is way over priced
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this nothing like shown on the info merchalls no wonderful flavor or tenderness not as good as a confection oven

customer_reviews.title: Everything tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is great you can make anything in 10 minutes or little more I didn't use any oil I taste great you can make french fries chicken grilled cheese but easy to clean even kids they can use it

customer_reviews.title: Great for bacon.
customer_reviews.text: 8ve only ever cooked bacon and other meat in it but it works well. Downside is the small basket and not being able to turn the timer off.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE A MOGG

product_meta.title: Philips Kitchen Appliances Viva Philips TurboStar Airfryer with Cookbook, 5, Black
product_meta.description: Air is the new oil, and now with the Philips Airfryer you can use that air to fry in a healthier way with up to 75%** less fat! With the Philips’ patented TurboStar technology, all food is exposed to constant, circulating heat allowing you to cook your favorite foods with a tablespoon or less of oil evenly with no turning needed. In addition to the heated air flow, powerful direct heat from above quickly crisps the food for delicious, golden-brown results while draining excess fat. The efficiency of TurboStar technology also means the air fryer is instantly hot and ready to use immediately. With no preheat needed in the air fryer, you can save time and start cooking right away. The air fryer also grills, roasts and even bakes so you have more options when feeding your family and entertaining guests.
feature_bullets: The new & unique Turbos tar technology swirls hot air continuously throughout cooking basket. The food is exposed to this constant, circulating heat, It is cooked through while draining excess fat
The Air fryer is ready to cook in seconds. No preheating saves time and you can start cooking right away
The next generation Philips Air fryer has been thoughtfully designed to fit on your countertop, now 20% smaller with the same 1. 8lb capacity
Your air fryer includes a Quick Clean basket with removable non-stick mesh so cleaning is fast and easy. The removable nonstick Coated drawer and the food basket are dishwasher safe
Philips Air fryer is the world's #1 Air fryer with over 8 million units sold. Voltage: 110V. Material of main body-Plastic
